item.name: Remap F19 (ctrl_L) to ctrl, alt, cmd, shift
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::F19, KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L

item.name: Remap ctrl_L to ctrl_L (when typed, send ctrl-a)
item.autogen: --KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::CONTROL_L, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::A, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L
